title: Leonie
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of Jan 2016, very few vegan choices are available in the area. Has a self service salad bar with lots of fresh vegan toppings and at times quinoa. Soups are often vegan; ingredients marked on website. Has a vegetarian sandwich and a pasta; vegans please inquire if they can be made vegan. Friendly owner, open to suggestions, considering adding vegetarian/vegan/gluten free labels in store and on website. Has seating.
